Oct 21 W07D3 Problem Solving 05: Conservation of Momentum and Collisions

problem.p: (1) Why can we think of a planetary flyby of a satellite as an example of an elastic collision? Then explain how you can use the concepts of relative velocity and momentum to analyze such an interaction.

(2) If you standing on a cart that is on a frictionless track and you throw an object at angle of 30 degrees relative to the cart. Is the angle with respect to the ground greater than, equal to, less than 30 degrees. Explain your reasoning.
